articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Austria's Kurz says Greens coalition 'best of both worlds'
articles.description: Austrian conservative leader Sebastian Kurz says his party's coalition deal with the Greens offers “the best of both worlds” and will allow both partners to keep their election promises
articles.content:
BERLIN -- 
Austrian conservative leader Sebastian Kurz says his party's coalition deal with the Greens, who are set to join the Alpine country's government for the first time, offers the best of both worlds and will allow both partners to keep their election… [+913 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Home falls down sandy bluff along Lake Michigan shoreline
articles.description: A western Michigan lakefront home has fallen down a sandy bluff in an area plagued by erosion
articles.content:
WHITE RIVER TOWNSHIP, Mich. -- 
A small home along the Lake Michigan shoreline in Michigan fell down a sandy bluff in an area plagued by erosion.
Muskegon County officials had been monitoring the condition of the White River Township home that toppled over … [+1282 chars]

articles.author: Allie Yang, Joseph Diaz
articles.title: Woman held captive by school bus driver for nearly 11 years on how she survived
articles.description: "You can overcome all obstacles that stand in your way,” Knight said. “Don't let the darkness control your light in your life."
articles.content:
Michelle Knight had known unimaginable hardship long before she was abducted in 2002 at the age of 21, then held captive and repeatedly raped and tortured for nearly 11 years by Ariel Castro, a school bus driver and local musician.
Shed fought to overcome wh… [+9929 chars]

articles.author: SCOTT BAUER Associated Press
articles.title: Conservatives seek immediate purge of voters in Wisconsin
articles.description: Conservatives are asking a judge to find the Wisconsin Elections Commission in contempt for not immediately purging more than 200,000 voters from the rolls
articles.content:
MADISON, Wis. -- 
A conservative law firm on Thursday asked a judge to find the Wisconsin Elections Commission in contempt and fine its members $2,000 a day until it immediately purges more than 200,000 voters from the rolls, a move Democrats are fighting in… [+2820 chars]

articles.title: Mississippi inmate killed during prison fight amid lockdown
articles.description: A Mississippi coroner confirms an inmate has died and several others have been injured in a fight at Parchman, just days after a separate inmate's killing led to an ongoing lockdown of dozens of correctional facilities
articles.content:

articles.title: Hillary Clinton gets role at Queen's University in Belfast
articles.description: Former U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton has been appointed as chancellor of Queen's University in Northern Ireland
articles.content:
LONDON --
